title: What One Can Blog...
content:
And mine is at [http://lasquetipress.blogspot.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102125228/http:/lasquetipress.blogspot.com/ "http://lasquetipress.blogspot.com")

If you really care...
author: Linda Cunningham

comments.content:
Hey,

I blogged about your flexagon book at [Link En Fuego](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102125228/http:/linkenfuego.wordpress.com/2007/06/16/i-am-here-to-inform-you-that-linda-cunningham-my-fellow-at-typophile-had-finished-her-excellent-flexagon-book/) about a week ago. I then left a message on your blog, but I guess it somehow didn't came through.

Be seein' ya.

- Bram
I'll add a link to your blog when I do a major revamp of mine next week -- it didn't go missing, Bram. ;-)
Revamp is done -- comments (pro and con) appreciated. ;-)
